transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Hello madam ji.
Customer: Ha sir.
Executive: Ha ye jo abhi aapne bataya na wo Patel Krishi Kendra Narsinghpur ka.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aisi mere ko do inquiry jo galat galat aayi hai us din aayi thi ek oil ki oil ke vishay mein tha abhi jo aayi to pesticide dawa ke vishay mein hai.
Customer: Kya kya kya fir se bataiye kya inquiry galat tha sir aapka?
Customer: Ye jo aapne inquiry abhi maine Narsinghpur ki baat kiya na.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Ye pesticide dawa chahiye unko na ki tape.
Customer: Dawai chahiye unko tape nahi chahiye. Okay.
Customer: Ha tape nahi chahiye aur unhone jo bata rahe hain ki bhaiya kaun ne aisa dal diya main pareshan ho gaya bole mere ko bahut phone aa rahe hain bole.
Customer: To unhone galat inquiry post kara aapne baat kar liya unse na?
Customer: Ha kar liya waisi mere ko us din oil walon ka bhi tha bole oil ka jarurat hai bole maine phone lagaya tha to.
Customer: Okay rukiye main aapka sir mere hisab se na catalog mein mere bhi kuch add ho gaya hoga main ek bar check karti hu aap call kariye aur abhi jo inquiries wagaira aur kuch tha usme?
Customer: Nahi nahi usme to ek inquiry thi na abhi.
Customer: Aapne abhi tak aur matlab total kitne IndiaMART ke bahar se baat kara hai sir?
Customer: Teen ya char.
Customer: Teen ya char se usme wrong kitna hua hai?
Customer: Usme do ho gaye.
Customer: Do wrong ho gaya hai.
Customer: Ha okay kuch bhi aapko positive response nikal ke aaya hai?
Customer: Ek wo jo kya kehte hain bhai jisse baat hui thi Raipur wo to positive tha lekin unhone mal nahi liye wo bole ki hum main baad mein lagata hu karke is type ka kal Indore se Indore ek Jabalpur ka tha to unhone Indore se le liya.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Unse baat nahi ho payi thi ki notice nahi aaya tha apne ko.
Customer: Okay pehle aapne ye sab add kar rakha tha paper making making white printing self advisor tape ye sab aapne out of stock kar diya hai sir?
Customer: Ha sab sab sab mere paas tape ka hi kam hai jitne tape hai abhi.
Customer: Jitne tape hai usi ka tha yaha pe main dekh rahi hu wo sab jo tape mein aapne add kar rakha hai thoda sa kitna product total aapka sir add hai 18 product add hai jisme aapne che product inactive kar diya hai jaise 65 meter BOPP transparent tape isme aap deal nahi kar rahe?
Customer: Nahi kar rahe hain na.
Customer: Kar rahe hain isko stock mein mark kar du sir?
Customer: Kar de kar dijiye usko hai na already hai wo.
Customer: 40 meter BOPP tape isko.
Customer: Ha wo bhi hai wo bhi hai.
Customer: Ye bhi hai aur fir transparent BOPP cello tape ye.
Customer: Ha ha ji.
Customer: To ye sir out of stock mein kisne sara mark kiya hai aapka 300 meter BOPP transparent tip koi aur aapka portal handle karta hai kya sir?
Customer: Pata nahi mujhe.
Customer: Nahi nahi mere alawa to koi hai hi nahi.
Customer: Aapke alawa koi nahi hai.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Yaha pe jo bhi ye sara out of stock wala tha na sir maine usko stock mein mark kar diya hai ek bar aap check kar lijiyega aapne aapka jaha pe maine abhi lead manager dikhaya na.
Customer: Ha ha.
Customer: Uske bagal mein dekhiyega ek product ka section aata hai product pe ja ke check kar lijiyega jo bhi aapko product aapka genuine lagega aap usko ek bar sahi se otherwise wo jo aapne abhi buyleads ka feedback diya hai.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Thik hai main unse ek bar connect karke aapko confirm karti hu jo matlab wo kya hai reason jo wo fake hai aur kyun fake hai aur isse pehle aur aapko kaun se din mein fake aaya tha?
Customer: Oil ka aaya tha.
Customer: Oil ka aapke upar oil ka aaya tha wo tape ka tha hi nahi.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Okay okay aur abhi service ka kitna din hua hai sir aapka aaya hua IndiaMART pe lagbhag ek mahina?
Customer: Nahi nahi 15 din hue abhi.
Customer: 15 din hi hua hai thik hai to wo 15 din mein kuch business wagaira nikal ke aaya hai sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi aaya.
Customer: Kuch bhi business nikal ke nahi aaya hai bas ek positive line mile the jo aapko time de diye.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Wahi na otherwise yaha pe form tape wagaira jo bhi hai unka specific wagaira.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Ab to hai hamare paas tape hai.
Customer: Ha?
Customer: Product mein jitna sara aapka add hai uske alawa bhi kuch add karna hai ya fir thik hai sir abhi?
Customer: Main karunga abhi ultratech tape karunga do teen tape hai mere paas wo karunga.
Customer: Ye sab to ha aapko agar koi help ki jarurat padegi to aap mera number hai hi ya yahi number aap save kar lo sir direct ispe bhi aap call karoge to main receive kar lungi otherwise main ek aapko ye aapka whatsapp pe bhi number hai jo jisse abhi baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji ji ji ji.
Customer: Okay thik hai main aapko aise aapko whatsapp pe bhi text kar deti hu jo aapka jo material hota hai tape ka wo kya hota hai sir PVC ya fir rubber silicon kya hota hai?
Customer: PVC.
Customer: PVC hota hai okay thik hai to ye brand kaun sa hota hai aapka own brand?
Customer: Dekho hamare ek acrylic bhi hai hamare paas PVC bhi hai aur BOPP bhi hai tape alag alag type ke tape hai na.
Customer: Okay okay thik hai ye sara add karke main aapko whatsapp pe text karti hu aapko kuch bhi jarurat ho sir direct connect kar lena thik hai?
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Thik hai thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received wrong inquiries (oil, pesticide).

- Wants to add Ultratech tape to catalog.

- Some products are marked out of stock.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed marking products in stock.

- Executive will check buyleads feedback.

- Executive will text the customer on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to check product listings.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiries, catalog, products, out of stock
